sentences.en: a cream-coloured carpet
sentences.cn: 奶黄色的地毯

sentences.en: cream silk stockings
sentences.cn: 乳白色的长筒丝袜

sentences.en: fresh cream
sentences.cn: 鲜奶油

sentences.en: Garnish the plate with whipped cream rosettes and fresh fruits.
sentences.cn: 用玫瑰花形的掼奶油和新鲜的水果作配菜点缀盘子。

sentences.en: Greek yogurt contains much less fat than double cream.
sentences.cn: 希腊酸奶比高脂浓奶油所含脂肪要少得多。

sentences.en: He has been accused of skimming the cream off the economy.
sentences.cn: 他被控从经济中捞取了丰厚的油水。

sentences.en: He was wearing a cream silk shirt and a tartan golfing cap.
sentences.cn: 他身着一件米色丝绸衬衫，头戴一顶花格子高尔夫球帽。

sentences.en: Reduced-calorie cheese is a great substitute for cream cheese.
sentences.cn: 低卡路里干酪是奶油干酪的极佳替代品。

sentences.en: Remove the bowl from the ice and stir in the cream.
sentences.cn: 从冰里把碗取出，搅入奶油。

sentences.en: Sensitive Cream will not strip away the skin's protective layer.
sentences.cn: 敏感肌肤专用面霜不会破坏皮肤表面的保护层。

sentences.en: She gave him an extra scoop of clotted cream.
sentences.cn: 她多给他加了一勺浓缩奶油。

sentences.en: strawberries and cream
sentences.cn: 浇奶油的草莓

sentences.en: sun cream
sentences.cn: 防晒霜

sentences.en: The Ball was attended by the cream of Hollywood society.
sentences.cn: 好莱坞的大牌影星们出席了那个舞会。

sentences.en: The Italian way is to round off a meal with an ice-cream.
sentences.cn: 意大利人总是在用餐结束时来份冰激凌。

sentences.en: The paintwork, the wardrobes and the bedside cupboards were coffee-cream.
sentences.cn: 漆面、衣柜和床头柜是浅咖啡色的。

sentences.en: The private schools cream off many of the best pupils.
sentences.cn: 私立学校招走了很多优秀的学生。

sentences.en: the schools cream off some of the more able pupils.
sentences.cn: 学校挑选一些更有能力的学生。

sentences.en: Thin down your mayonnaise with soured cream or natural yoghurt.
sentences.cn: 用酸奶油或原味酸奶稀释蛋黄酱。

sentences.en: This means smaller banks can cream off big profits during lending booms.
sentences.cn: 这意味着在贷款业务剧增时小银行能够获得大笔利润。

sentences.en: Use a light touch when applying cream or make-up.
sentences.cn: 涂抹乳霜或化妆品时动作要轻。

words.tran_cn: 奶油色的；乳脂状的；含乳脂的
奶油分离器；盛奶油的器皿；制作奶油的人

phrases.tran_cn: （尤指用不公平手段）挑选精英；提取精华
n. 冰淇淋蛋卷；盛冰淇淋的锥形杯
可打稠制作掼奶油的奶油；奶油含量过高的乳酪

trans.tran_cn: 奶油色的，淡黄色的，米色的
奶油，护肤霜，药膏，奶油色，精英，精华
trans.tran_en: a thick yellow-white liquid that rises to the top of milk
